finalCta.title: An AI customer care that knows your every product
finalCta.description: Imagine a virtual assistant that perfectly knows every detail of your catalog, the status of every order, and responds in real-time 24/7. Leader24 helps your customers find exactly what they're looking for and transforms their satisfaction into sales.

implementation.question: How long does it take to implement Leader24 in my e-commerce?
implementation.answer: Basic implementation takes only 3-5 working days. Advanced customizations may require an additional 1-2 weeks, depending on the complexity and integrations needed.

integration.question: Does Leader24 integrate with my existing e-commerce platform?
integration.answer: Yes, Leader24 offers native integrations with Shopify and WooCommerce, ensuring perfect synchronization of catalog, inventory, and order status. The system connects via official APIs, without requiring code changes or custom development.

satisfaction.question: How does AI improve e-commerce customer satisfaction?
satisfaction.answer: An always-available AI customer care eliminates frustration from waiting, provides precise responses about products and orders, and guides the customer through every stage of the purchase. This dramatically improves the user experience, with an average 82% increase in satisfaction and a consequent 37% increase in sales.

catalog.question: How does the AI know my entire product catalog?
catalog.answer: Leader24 integrates directly with your e-commerce system, automatically synchronizing every product, variant, availability, and price. Any catalog changes are immediately learned by the AI, which can then provide always up-to-date and accurate information to customers, improving their shopping experience and increasing sales.
